name: CIPDF417CodeDescriptor
desc: A concrete subclass of CIBarcodeDescriptor that represents a PDF 417 symbol.

items.name: init?(payload: Data, isCompact: Bool, rowCount: Int, columnCount: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a descriptor that can be used as input to the CIBarcodeGenerator filter.

items.name: var errorCorrectedPayload: Data
items.desc: The error-corrected payload containing the data encoded in the PDF417 code.

items.name: var isCompact: Bool
items.desc: A boolean value telling if the PDF417 code is compact.

items.name: var rowCount: Int
items.desc: The number of rows in the PDF417 code.

items.name: var columnCount: Int
items.desc: The number of columns in the PDF417 code.
